page.title: 15Industry
page.content: Industry in the area consists of a number of small factories,many in converted mills.Light engineering predominates.Many factories have had to adapt or change the product to fit in with modern life. The following ones illustrated in Drighlington typifying the area. {C.B.Brook & Co.Ltd.},established since 1898,has been in {Drighlington}40 years. Bunting material is woven there to make flags for all over the world. Also fabric for mens cloaks in the Middle East. Twenty people are employed there. {Extrusion Systems},established for 50 years,make machinery for producing synthetic fibres which is exportd to all parts of the world. Staffing has increased recently and the business has grown by 300% in the last twelve months. There are plans for expansion
